channel.title: All Stories on GaadiKey Memories
channel.description: Recent content in All Stories on GaadiKey Memories

item.title: Jawa 42 - "My Bike decides the destination" - Pavan Chandra
item.description: We got an opportunity to meet and interview Mr Pavan Chandra, an engineer based out of Bengaluru who owns the popular Jawa 42 motorcycle. Following are the transcript of conversation. What made you buy the new Jawa 42 motorcycle? I always wanted to own a motorcycle with higher capacity engine and also the one which has got an appealing and retro design. I felt Jawa 42 is the right choice to make.

item.title: 2022 Ford Service Commitment Campaign
item.description: The digital (60Sec) and television spots (30 Sec) that follow, also convey Fordâ€™s Feels-Like- Family commitment message, using the power of emotional storytelling. The campaign film opens with the protagonist handing over the keys of her EcoSport to a Ford Service executive. The film then shows her looking at their sparingly used Ford Ikon and enquiring if the old Ikon can also be serviced, just to surprise her mother on her birthday.
